00040 class EleSelectionProducers : public edm::EDProducer {
00041 
00042   //  typedef pat::strbitset SelectionValue_t;
00043   typedef float SelectionValue_t;
00044   typedef edm::ValueMap<SelectionValue_t> SelectionMap;
00045   typedef std::vector< edm::Handle< edm::ValueMap<double> > > IsoDepositValsHandles_t;
00046 
00047 public:
00048   explicit EleSelectionProducers(const edm::ParameterSet&);
00049   ~EleSelectionProducers();
00050 
00051   static void fillDescriptions(edm::ConfigurationDescriptions& descriptions);
00052 
00053 private:
00054   virtual void beginJob() ;
00055   virtual void produce(edm::Event&, const edm::EventSetup&);
00056   virtual void endJob() ;
00057       
00058   virtual void beginRun(edm::Run&, edm::EventSetup const&);
00059   virtual void endRun(edm::Run&, edm::EventSetup const&);
00060   virtual void beginLuminosityBlock(edm::LuminosityBlock&, edm::EventSetup const&);
00061   virtual void endLuminosityBlock(edm::LuminosityBlock&, edm::EventSetup const&);
00062 
00063   // ----------member data ---------------------------
00064 private:
00065   edm::Handle<std::vector<reco::GsfElectron> > electronsHandle;
00066   edm::Handle<reco::ConversionCollection> conversionsHandle;
00067   edm::Handle<reco::BeamSpot> bsHandle;
00068   edm::Handle<reco::VertexCollection> vertexHandle;
00069   edm::Handle< edm::ValueMap<double> > chIsoValsHandle, emIsoValsHandle, nhIsoValsHandle;
00070   edm::Handle<double> rhoHandle;
00071 
00072 
00074   edm::InputTag electronsTAG;
00075   // conversions
00076   edm::InputTag conversionsProducerTAG;
00077   edm::InputTag BeamSpotTAG;
00078   edm::InputTag VertexTAG;
00079   // isolation
00080   edm::InputTag chIsoValsTAG, emIsoValsTAG, nhIsoValsTAG;
00082   edm::InputTag rhoTAG;
00083 
00084 
00085   SimpleCutBasedElectronIDSelectionFunctor fiducial_selector;
00086   SimpleCutBasedElectronIDSelectionFunctor WP70_PU_selector;
00087   SimpleCutBasedElectronIDSelectionFunctor WP80_PU_selector;
00088   SimpleCutBasedElectronIDSelectionFunctor WP90_PU_selector;
00089   SimpleCutBasedElectronIDSelectionFunctor loose_selector;
00090   SimpleCutBasedElectronIDSelectionFunctor medium_selector;
00091   SimpleCutBasedElectronIDSelectionFunctor tight_selector;
00092 
00093 };

00096 EleSelectionProducers::EleSelectionProducers(const edm::ParameterSet& iConfig):
00097   electronsTAG(iConfig.getParameter<edm::InputTag>("electronCollection")),
00098   conversionsProducerTAG(iConfig.getParameter<edm::InputTag>("conversionCollection")),
00099   BeamSpotTAG(iConfig.getParameter<edm::InputTag>("BeamSpotCollection")),
00100   VertexTAG(iConfig.getParameter<edm::InputTag>("vertexCollection")),
00101   chIsoValsTAG(iConfig.getParameter<edm::InputTag>("chIsoVals")),
00102   emIsoValsTAG(iConfig.getParameter<edm::InputTag>("emIsoVals")),
00103   nhIsoValsTAG(iConfig.getParameter<edm::InputTag>("nhIsoVals")),
00104   rhoTAG(iConfig.getParameter<edm::InputTag>("rhoFastJet")),
00105 
00106   fiducial_selector("fiducial", electronsHandle, conversionsHandle, bsHandle, vertexHandle,
00107                     chIsoValsHandle, emIsoValsHandle, nhIsoValsHandle, rhoHandle),
00108   WP70_PU_selector("WP70PU", electronsHandle, conversionsHandle, bsHandle, vertexHandle,
00109                     chIsoValsHandle, emIsoValsHandle, nhIsoValsHandle, rhoHandle),
00110   WP80_PU_selector("WP80PU", electronsHandle, conversionsHandle, bsHandle, vertexHandle,
00111                     chIsoValsHandle, emIsoValsHandle, nhIsoValsHandle, rhoHandle),
00112   WP90_PU_selector("WP90PU", electronsHandle, conversionsHandle, bsHandle, vertexHandle,
00113                     chIsoValsHandle, emIsoValsHandle, nhIsoValsHandle, rhoHandle),
00114   loose_selector("loose", electronsHandle, conversionsHandle, bsHandle, vertexHandle,
00115                     chIsoValsHandle, emIsoValsHandle, nhIsoValsHandle, rhoHandle),
00116   medium_selector("medium", electronsHandle, conversionsHandle, bsHandle, vertexHandle,
00117                     chIsoValsHandle, emIsoValsHandle, nhIsoValsHandle, rhoHandle),
00118   tight_selector("tight", electronsHandle, conversionsHandle, bsHandle, vertexHandle,
00119                     chIsoValsHandle, emIsoValsHandle, nhIsoValsHandle, rhoHandle)
00120 {
00121   //register your products
00122   /* Examples
00123      produces<ExampleData2>();
00124 
00125      //if do put with a label
00126      produces<ExampleData2>("label");
00127  
00128      //if you want to put into the Run
00129      produces<ExampleData2,InRun>();
00130   */
00131   produces< SelectionMap >("fiducial");
00132   produces< SelectionMap >("WP70PU");
00133   produces< SelectionMap >("WP80PU");
00134   produces< SelectionMap >("WP90PU");
00135   produces< SelectionMap >("loose");
00136   produces< SelectionMap >("medium");
00137   produces< SelectionMap >("tight");
00138 
00139   //now do what ever other initialization is needed
00140   
00141 }

00157 // ------------ method called to produce the data  ------------
00158 void EleSelectionProducers::produce(edm::Event& iEvent, const edm::EventSetup& iSetup)
00159 {
00160   using namespace edm;
00161 
00162   std::vector<SelectionValue_t>  fiducial_vec;
00163   std::vector<SelectionValue_t>  WP70_PU_vec;
00164   std::vector<SelectionValue_t>  WP80_PU_vec;
00165   std::vector<SelectionValue_t>  WP90_PU_vec;
00166   std::auto_ptr<SelectionMap> fiducialMap(new SelectionMap());
00167   std::auto_ptr<SelectionMap> WP70_PUMap(new SelectionMap());
00168   std::auto_ptr<SelectionMap> WP80_PUMap(new SelectionMap());
00169   std::auto_ptr<SelectionMap> WP90_PUMap(new SelectionMap());
00170   std::vector<SelectionValue_t>  loose_vec;
00171   std::vector<SelectionValue_t>  medium_vec;
00172   std::vector<SelectionValue_t>  tight_vec;
00173   std::auto_ptr<SelectionMap> looseMap(new SelectionMap());
00174   std::auto_ptr<SelectionMap> mediumMap(new SelectionMap());
00175   std::auto_ptr<SelectionMap> tightMap(new SelectionMap());
00176 
00177 
00178   //------------------------------ ELECTRON
00179   iEvent.getByLabel(electronsTAG, electronsHandle);
00180   //if(!electronsHandle.isValid()){
00181   //  std::cerr << "[ERROR] electron collection not found" << std::endl;
00182   //  return;
00183   //}
00184    
00185   //------------------------------ CONVERSIONS
00186   iEvent.getByLabel(conversionsProducerTAG, conversionsHandle);
00187   //   std::cout << conversionsHandle.isValid() << std::endl;
00188   iEvent.getByLabel(BeamSpotTAG, bsHandle);
00189   iEvent.getByLabel(VertexTAG, vertexHandle);
00190   //------------------------------ RHO
00191   iEvent.getByLabel(rhoTAG,rhoHandle);
00192 
00193   //------------------------------ ISO DEPOSITS
00194   iEvent.getByLabel(chIsoValsTAG, chIsoValsHandle);
00195   if(!chIsoValsHandle.isValid()){
00196     chIsoValsTAG=edm::InputTag(chIsoValsTAG.label().substr(0,chIsoValsTAG.label().find("PFIso",chIsoValsTAG.label().size()-6))+"Gsf", chIsoValsTAG.instance(), chIsoValsTAG.process());
00197     emIsoValsTAG=edm::InputTag(emIsoValsTAG.label().substr(0,emIsoValsTAG.label().find("PFIso",emIsoValsTAG.label().size()-6))+"Gsf", emIsoValsTAG.instance(), emIsoValsTAG.process());
00198     nhIsoValsTAG=edm::InputTag(nhIsoValsTAG.label().substr(0,nhIsoValsTAG.label().find("PFIso",nhIsoValsTAG.label().size()-6))+"Gsf", nhIsoValsTAG.instance(), nhIsoValsTAG.process());
00199 
00200   iEvent.getByLabel(chIsoValsTAG, chIsoValsHandle);
00201 
00202   }
00203   iEvent.getByLabel(emIsoValsTAG, emIsoValsHandle);  
00204   iEvent.getByLabel(nhIsoValsTAG, nhIsoValsHandle);
00205   
00206    
00207 #ifdef DEBUG
00208   std::cout << "[DEBUG] Starting loop over electrons" << std::endl;
00209 #endif
00210   for(reco::GsfElectronCollection::const_iterator ele_itr = (electronsHandle)->begin(); 
00211       ele_itr != (electronsHandle)->end(); ele_itr++){
00212     const reco::GsfElectronRef eleRef(electronsHandle, ele_itr-electronsHandle->begin());
00213 
00214     // the new tree has one event per each electron
00215     pat::strbitset fiducial_ret;
00216     pat::strbitset WP70_PU_ret;
00217     pat::strbitset WP80_PU_ret;
00218     pat::strbitset WP90_PU_ret;
00219     pat::strbitset loose_ret;
00220     pat::strbitset medium_ret;
00221     pat::strbitset tight_ret;
00222 
00223 
00224     fiducial_selector(eleRef, fiducial_ret);
00225     fiducial_vec.push_back(fiducial_selector.result());
00226 
00227     WP70_PU_selector(eleRef, WP70_PU_ret);
00228     WP80_PU_selector(eleRef, WP80_PU_ret);
00229     WP90_PU_selector(eleRef, WP90_PU_ret);
00230      
00231     WP70_PU_vec.push_back(WP70_PU_selector.result()); // result gives a float
00232     WP80_PU_vec.push_back(WP80_PU_selector.result()); // result gives a float
00233     WP90_PU_vec.push_back(WP90_PU_selector.result()); // result gives a float
00234 
00235     WP70_PU_selector(eleRef, WP70_PU_ret);
00236     WP80_PU_selector(eleRef, WP80_PU_ret);
00237     WP90_PU_selector(eleRef, WP90_PU_ret);
00238 
00239     loose_selector(eleRef, loose_ret);
00240     loose_vec.push_back(loose_selector.result());
00241     medium_selector(eleRef, medium_ret);
00242     medium_vec.push_back(medium_selector.result());
00243     tight_selector(eleRef, tight_ret);
00244     tight_vec.push_back(tight_selector.result());
00245 
00246     if(((bool)tight_selector.result())){
00247       if(!(bool) medium_selector.result() || !(bool) loose_selector.result()){
00248         edm::LogError("Incoherent selection") << "passing tight but not medium or loose";
00249         exit (1);
00250       }
00251     }
00252 
00253     if(((bool)medium_selector.result())){
00254       if( !(bool) loose_selector.result()){
00255         edm::LogError("Incoherent selection") << "passing medium but not loose";
00256         exit (1);
00257       }
00258     }
00259     
00260     //     WP80_PU_vec.push_back((SelectionValue_t)WP80_PU_selector.bitMask());
00261     //     WP90_PU_vec.push_back((SelectionValue_t)WP90_PU_selector.bitMask());
00262 #ifdef DEBUG
00263     std::cout << "[DEBUG] WP80 ret=" << WP80_PU_selector.bitMask() << std::endl;
00264     std::cout << "[DEBUG] WP80 ret= (float)" << (SelectionValue_t) WP80_PU_selector.bitMask() << std::endl;
00265     std::cout << "[DEBUG] loose ret=" << loose_selector.bitMask() << std::endl;
00266     std::cout << "[DEBUG] loose ret= (float)" << (SelectionValue_t) loose_selector.bitMask() << std::endl;
00267 
00268 #endif
00269   }
00270 
00271   //prepare product 
00272   // declare the filler of the ValueMap
00273   SelectionMap::Filler fiducial_filler(*fiducialMap);
00274   SelectionMap::Filler WP70_PU_filler(*WP70_PUMap);
00275   SelectionMap::Filler WP80_PU_filler(*WP80_PUMap);
00276   SelectionMap::Filler WP90_PU_filler(*WP90_PUMap);
00277   SelectionMap::Filler loose_filler(*looseMap);
00278   SelectionMap::Filler medium_filler(*mediumMap);
00279   SelectionMap::Filler tight_filler(*tightMap);
00280 
00281   //fill and insert valuemap
00282   fiducial_filler.insert(electronsHandle,fiducial_vec.begin(),fiducial_vec.end());
00283   WP70_PU_filler.insert(electronsHandle,WP70_PU_vec.begin(),WP70_PU_vec.end());
00284   WP80_PU_filler.insert(electronsHandle,WP80_PU_vec.begin(),WP80_PU_vec.end());
00285   WP90_PU_filler.insert(electronsHandle,WP90_PU_vec.begin(),WP90_PU_vec.end());
00286   loose_filler.insert(electronsHandle,loose_vec.begin(),loose_vec.end());
00287   medium_filler.insert(electronsHandle,medium_vec.begin(),medium_vec.end());
00288   tight_filler.insert(electronsHandle,tight_vec.begin(),tight_vec.end());
00289 
00290   
00291   fiducial_filler.fill();
00292   WP70_PU_filler.fill();
00293   WP80_PU_filler.fill();
00294   WP90_PU_filler.fill();
00295   loose_filler.fill();
00296   medium_filler.fill();
00297   tight_filler.fill();
00298     
00299 
00300   //------------------------------
00301   // put the ValueMap in the event
00302   iEvent.put(fiducialMap, "fiducial");
00303   iEvent.put(WP70_PUMap, "WP70PU");
00304   iEvent.put(WP80_PUMap, "WP80PU");
00305   iEvent.put(WP90_PUMap, "WP90PU");
00306   iEvent.put(looseMap, "loose");
00307   iEvent.put(mediumMap, "medium");
00308   iEvent.put(tightMap, "tight");
00309  
00310 }
